original_text: Nevertheless he clung to the sins of Jeroboam son of Nebat, which he had caused Israel to commit; he did not turn away from them.
korean_text: 그러나 그가 느밧의 아들 여로보암이 이스라엘에게 범하게 한 그 죄를 따라 행하고 떠나지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Nevertheless he clung to the sins of Jeroboam
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고 그는 여로보암의 죄에 붙어 있었으니

sentences.original_text: which he had caused Israel to commit
he did not turn away from them
